questions.question: What does it mean to use an irregular verb in the past tense?

choices.answer: It's a verb that's not very common
It's a verb that doesn't use 'avoir' after the speaker
It's a verb that doesn't follow the usual ER/IR/RE rules
It's a bird! It's a plane!

choices.answer: I don't know
False
True

False

questions.question: Mettez au Passé Composé: Je (boire) du chocolat chaud ce matin
